description: The Palestinian president condemns the war, as Israel says it will last "many more months".
maintext: It is believed that more than 100 hostages remain alive in Gaza, after 105 were released from captivity in late November, most of them Israeli women and children. A number of bodies have also been recovered and Israeli officials have confirmed the deaths of more than 20 people who had been held by Hamas.
title: Israel expanding ground offensive into central Gaza refugee camps
